description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Quoting product of Oracle E-Business Suite (component: Courseware). Supported versions that are affected are 12.1.1-12.1.3. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Quoting. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized creation, deletion or modification access to critical data or all Oracle Quoting accessible data as well as unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle Quoting accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 8.1 (Confidentiality and Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:N).
